name: Kuiper - The Last Stand
description:
STORY

The Baphraell have launched an attack against our solar system.

As one of the last remaining ships in the Seraph Defense Force you must engage them in the Kuiper Belt before they reach our space.

CONTROLS

Movement: Arrow Keys -or- WASD

Fire Weapons: Spacebar

GAMEPLAY

  • Asteroids Clone  
  • Shields & Weapon Mods
  • Multiple Enemy Types & Behaviors
  • Local Highest Score Recorded
  • 1,000,000 Points to WIN

NOTE:  Generally completed, but always willing to consider player input.
